properties.Name: CustomerSecurityQuestion
properties.Description: A security question and response that is used to verify the customer's identity.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: SecurityQuestionNumber
Columns.Description: The number associated with the order in which the question is asked for the purpose of identification.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp that the customer is associated with the security question.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp that the customer is associated with the security question.

Columns.Name: CustomerSecurityQuestion
Columns.Description: The security question used to challenge the Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerSecurityQuestionResponse
Columns.Description: The response to the security question used to challenge the Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerSecurityQuestionNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Security Question.
